description:
Aleska Diamond sees her maid Sophie Lynx goofing off, and she’s not pleased,
particularly when Sophie dares to handle her whip! The saucy girl must be taught
a lesson. “So you like my whip?” says Aleska, cramming the handle into Sophie’s
mouth. “Maybe I’ll give you a further taste of it if you don’t perform your duties
properly!” Those duties include worshipping Mistress Aleska’s feet, kissing her
toes and the bottoms of the shoes. Aleska puts Sophie down on the floor to
worship her heels in an even more humble way. The mistress bends Sophie over
the bed for some whipping. She lifts up Sophie’s skirt and smacks the whip’s
thongs across her tawny cheeks. But those damn petticoats get in the way, so
Aleska has the maid remove her uniform so she can fully feel the sting of the
whip. She has Sophie kneel on the bed with her bottom up so that she can
punish with total ease and access. Mistress Aleska looks very fetching in her
high-waisted panties, a style that suits her regal attitude as she looms over her
moaning maid.
title: THE STING OF DISCIPLINE
